channel.title: Runserver problem (again)
channel.description:
alright new runserver problem here it is if anyone can help
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
also yes i know i have 200 rep it means nothing been here for a year quit for months and came back really rusty on everything

item.title: Runserver problem (again)
item.dc:creator: @Ace_tyras Ace tyras
item.description:
@Ace_tyras wrote:

ok this is very easy.
1st. MAKE SURE YOU DONT HAVE SERVER OR CLIENT OPEN
2nd.make changes to whatever you want.
3rd.compile it(your going to get that message but it it means that you have compiled.)
4th. put up your server and client and play!

Read full topic

i know why go to ur environment variables no change path and classpath to C:\Windows\System32; for now and then it will work and i swear tht was same probelm with me
